downloadTitle: Case Study: United Airlines and SharePoint Server 2013
downloadDescription: This case study gives an overview of new SharePoint Server 2013 Web Content Management and search features, and also how United Airlines used these features to improve their Service Catalog.
detailsSection: This case study gives an overview of new SharePoint Server 2013 Web Content Management and search features, and also how United Airlines used these features to improve their Service Catalog.
systemRequirementsSection: • The file is a Microsoft Word document. Users who do not have Microsoft Word can view this document through the downloadable Word Viewer.
installInstructionSection: 1. Choose the Download button on this page to start the download, and then Choose Go.
